item.title: Yes, There IS Rural Broadband For Businesses
item.description:
Many people are excited about the economic stimulus plan’s promise of expanded rural broadband access. However, you might already be able to get the internet speeds your rural business needs. Most major internet providers have overlooked rural areas, not because rural businesses are less important, but because the cost of installing infrastructure like coaxial cables or fiber optic cables is difficult to recoup when there are fewer customers. This is why cable and DSL internet services are less common in the countryside...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/yes-there-is-rural-broadband-for-businesses/
